# Scale

# Scale

Represents a musical scale - a series of notes following a specific pattern from a note(the tonic) which forms chords and can be used to compose infinite melodies. Either Name or Pattern must be provided!

Kind: global class

  • Scale
    • new exports.Scale(tonic, name, pattern)
    • instance
      • .notes
      • .semitones : Array
      • .name : *
      • .otherNames ⇒ * | string
      • .chords : Array
      • .seventhChords : Array
      • .pitchClassNamesString
      • .pitchClasses : Array
      • .pitchNamesString
      • .toString() ⇒ String
      • .degree(degree)
      • .chord(degree) ⇒ *
      • .play()
    • static
      • .chordsFromNotes(notes, seventh) ⇒ Array

# new exports.Scale(tonic, name, pattern)

Throws:

  • MissingInformation When not provided with tonic and either name or pattern
  • DataNotFound When called with name and the name cant be found in the database.
Param Type
tonic String/Note
name
pattern Array

Example

const c = new Note({note: 'c'})
const C_Major_by_pattern = new Scale({tonic:c, pattern: [0, 2, 4, 5, 7, 9, 11]}) // new C major scale.
const C_minor_by_name = new Scale({tonic:c, name: 'Minor'}) // new C major scale // new C minor scale.

# scale.notes

returns array that contains all the notes in the pattern.

Kind: instance property of Scale

# scale.semitones : Array

Returns the pattern for the scale as an array using semi-tone notation.

Kind: instance property of Scale

# scale.name : *

Returns the scale name.

Kind: instance property of Scale

# scale.otherNames ⇒ * | string

Returns other name of the scale.

Kind: instance property of Scale

# scale.chords : Array

Returns the chords of the scale in an array, calculated by taking each note, then skipping one note and taking the next, etc...to form the Chord.

Kind: instance property of Scale

# scale.seventhChords : Array

Returns the chords of the scale in an array, calculated by taking each note, then skipping one note and taking the next, etc...to form the Chord.

Kind: instance property of Scale

# scale.pitchClassNamesString

Returns a string of all the pitch class names in the scale.

Kind: instance property of Scale
Type{string}:

# scale.pitchClasses : Array

Returns an array of the pitch classes in the scale.

Kind: instance property of Scale

# scale.pitchNamesString

Returns a string of the pitch class names and octaves of the scale.

Kind: instance property of Scale
Type{string}:

# scale.toString() ⇒ String

returns the name of the scale.

Kind: instance method of Scale

# scale.degree(degree)

Returns the degree inside the Scale. for example - if the Scale is a C Major, than interval(1) wiil return D.

Kind: instance method of Scale

Param Type
degree Number

# scale.chord(degree) ⇒ *

Returns the chord that fits the scale degree note.

Kind: instance method of Scale

Param
degree

# scale.play()

Play the scale melodically.

Kind: instance method of Scale

# Scale.chordsFromNotes(notes, seventh) ⇒ Array

Gets an array of notes and returns a array of chords generated by the root + the note 2 degrees up + the note 4 degrees up

Kind: static method of Scale

Param Type Default Description
notes Array array of notes
seventh Boolean false whether to create a 7th chord
